title: Did Londoners Chant in Support of Donald Trump in the Aftermath of a Terrorist Attack?
subtitle: A video shows a small group of far-right activists chanting the U.S. President's name, but it was filmed months before a June 2017 attack.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A video shows Londoners expressing support for the US President, following a June 2017 terrorist attack in the city
